participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: playful and imaginative, full of curiosity about the world.
participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: creative and driven, passionate about music and his work.
participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i drive a 2015 honda civic. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza.

content.text: hi, how are you? I just got back from the holidays. I love it
I am a activist. I spend time watching the holidays with my rainbow hair
oh, I am sorry to hear that. what do you do for a living?
